message:
Yes, but not in 2012 when this was written. :)

This technique is still useful today for platforms that don't natively support async but can support it if you have Microsoft.Bcl.Async installed (e.g., .NET 4, WP SL, most portable libraries). In that case the "Task-based asynchronous" option is greyed out and you have to do the wrappers yourself.
